metadata.title: Cozy Up with These Fall Recipes

text: Our maple pecan latte recipe combines sweet and nutty flavours for a delicious taste experience - not to mention it's super simple to make too!
Ah, the first of fall. Cozy sweaters, crunchy leaves and pumpkin spice! It’s easy to whip up a fancy pumpkin spice latte at home with Nescafé coffee, silky steamed froth and a hint of spice.
